directions: Place the potatoes, garlic, salt, and pepper in a slow cooker; stir to coat. Season the pork roast with salt and pepper; lay atop the potatoes. Pour the sauerkraut over the roast; sprinkle with caraway seeds.
Cook in slow cooker on Low 8 to 10 hours.
title: Slow Cooker German-Style Pork Roast with Sauerkraut and Potatoes
